name: Knight's Run
description:
As an Illustrious Knight, You must run up the mountainside to reach its summit. With your previous training you have skills of passing all obstacles that stand infront of you, especially the solely unique ability to turn. This is a journey where stopping is not an option.

Assets Used to make this prototype were:

Pixel Run, by bellow.

Seamless HD landscape, by PWL

Dirt Platformer Tiles, by Sharm.

Flags 0, Nekith.

Spikey Stuff, Dravenx
